website_summaries.verdict: If you need a quiet bill counter to operate efficiently in the background, this is definitely one to consider.
pros: Can work continuously up to 2 hours
Uses UV and magnetic sensors to detect counterfeits
cons: Some miscounting reported if bills aren't aligned perfectly

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Dual Purpose Cash Counter and Mousetrap
customer_reviews.text: Left it on by accident over the weekend at work. Apparently we have mice, and one took an unsuccessful stroll right across the sensor. I now have cash counters posted all over my workspace in case there are any more mice.
customer_reviews.author: Dogemaster

customer_reviews.title: Is good at indentifying suspicious and damaged bills
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our church rummage sale. Works really well considering the cost. Is good at indentifying suspicious and damaged bills. Our count came out perfect when the bank redid the deposit on a much more expensive machine. Bills produce a lot of paper dust and dirt when counted so buy a mcro vac too to keep it clean.
customer_reviews.author: Watch Guy 006

customer_reviews.title: No longer working
customer_reviews.text: At this point after year and half it's no longer working. My first theory is that it's not working if humidity in the room is higher than regular. I think the problem is that higher humidity affects US currency is that it becomes a slightly more dump and this machine just can't count once the currency is slightly dump and by slightly I mean probably even by 15%. Also, it is possible that this machine is just no longer functioning because it wasn't build to last. I have it for over a year. It used to work fine, but it doesn't work well anymore even though I don't use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Anton

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: It can be a little finicky when it comes to counting imperfect or torn bills (rightfully so) but definitely worth buying. PS the hopper is quite sensitive so make sure your stack is nice and tight!
customer_reviews.author: Jade Envy

customer_reviews.title: Very heavy and takes a little practice to operate precisely.
customer_reviews.text: This is an overall nice counter. Seems to be quite accurate and catches fake bills immediately. It is quite heavy and can be a little tedious to get running until you get the hang of it. Not difficult to run.... there's just a little bit of a trick to how to load the bills when starting. The biggest complaint I have about this counter is its limit for counting. If you put too many bills in at once, you're going to run into issues. I would recommend it. Just need to familiarize yourself with it to get the most out of your purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: saving me a lot of time really like the functions/options maybe the bills ive ran through are in decent shape but i havent had many jams or issues yet just kinda plop the money down on it and let it do its thing lol if i get a couple more months out of it then i say it will have paid for itself. i only deal with us dollars so my usage reflects that
customer_reviews.author: jacob

customer_reviews.title: Bought 4 more!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my dad's money exchange business and he loved it!! The best part was that it shows the client what you are counting! He told me to buy 4 more.
customer_reviews.author: Klaryx

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and durable
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this for our office to help lessen amount of time used to manually count bills... This machine is working so far so good. It took a couple of tries to master a technique of setting the bills in the counter, but once figured out, my coworker and I LOVE this machine. It’s our go-to when having to count a lot of bills. FYI - it is a little on the heavy side, but I guess that makes it more sturdier.
customer_reviews.author: Bee

customer_reviews.title: Easy and Organized Money Counter
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t had a problem with it yet. I was nervous to buy because of some of the reviews. It is perfect, fast and organized. The instructions were a little confusing but I learned the whole thing in under 10 minutes. I think if you keep it in a cool area, safe surface, you really shouldn’t be having problems unless damages were done by the shipping process or something. I’ve also only had this for about a couple months but I also don’t use it constantly, so maybe that’s why I haven’t had any problems yet. Hope to not have any. Loved that it had a brush to clean it and bands for money.
customer_reviews.author: Erika Duran

customer_reviews.title: Just an OK machine
customer_reviews.text: Cheap bill counted. Dose not work well and miss counts all the time. I have had many money counters and this one is not that good. If bills are not perfect it will miss-count bills. Also the screen is in most terrible spot. I would recommend spending an extra 50 dollars and buying a well built machine that functions better
customer_reviews.author: Jered Hayward

customer_reviews.title: Fast, accurate, simple.
customer_reviews.text: We sell at swap meets and farmers markets. Lots of small bills. This machine is perfect. Beat up torn bills don't always feed thru and are a pain to get out of the machine, but you learn to quickly pull them out as you sort the bills into stacks of different denominations before putting them in this counter. Keep it clean. Don't put junk in it, you'll be happy. If you want more bells and whistles, spend big bucks. This machine is fast, accurate, simple. Just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for any business
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for any business, I am using it for a fundraiser where we handle lost of build constantly, it wont count the total amount of the actual type of bill but it will count the total of bills you are running, it does include a fake bill light alarm sensor to catch fake or bad bill, easy to use,compact, and very accurate when counting bills is a must..
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Perez

customer_reviews.title: Umm it counts the number of bills but doesn't actually ...
customer_reviews.text: Umm it counts the number of bills but doesn't actually count the amount its all worth.....update figured it out and you have to add all the numbers up, ans can change the value of the bills to count & Set it to stop at a certain number (bundles). Not what I expected but it works and is very fast!
customer_reviews.author: Amazonaddict

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! save yourself hundreds compared to other brands!
customer_reviews.text: Smooth, great design, all you need if you can sort and multiply the math yourself because it doesnt count for you. You want to sort all the same denomination anyways! Functions are easy to use too.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Chang

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I brought for before preparing for travel, I like to travel with lots of change, and the money machine is so quick counting the money, I keep it, even is bit pricey, because I hardly used it. I love the product, even I don't use much. I hardly carry lots of cash when I go out, only for travel. Thank you. It was really fun using the money machine to count money, than using my fingers to count, save so much times, thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super fast, very accurate once you get the hang of it, it’s a total asset.
customer_reviews.text: I like this product a lot, very accurate. Only reason I didn’t give it 5 start is because there some kind of short I’m the power cord, have to wiggle it to get it to work, if you bump it, it will shut off. I’m sure it can be fixed.
customer_reviews.author: kdubbs

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!
customer_reviews.text: As a treasurer for an organization that handles a good bit of money; this is my favorite thing in the world after my children. While this doesn't detect a twenty if you are counting fives or give you a dollar amount, it will count up to, say, 50 or 100 bills which makes things a lot easier. Great value.
customer_reviews.author: Yolanda

customer_reviews.title: Does work well with old Money
customer_reviews.text: I was looking to buy a new money counter and went through my order list to find to which one I shouldn't buy. This money counter only works well with new money not money that has been used more than 5 times. It's a no from me.
customer_reviews.author: Monique Springer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT detect fake bills.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it said it can detect fake bills. I put checks in it NOT even fake money, checks. It counts a check and regularly paper as money. I would not recommend buying if you want to know if your getting fake money.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Did everything expected. Very fast. Handled old and crumpled bills with ease. I didn't give it 5 stars due to the display design. The display is mounted on a flimsy stalk. When rotated for view, it blocks the carrying handle from lifting. Conversely, if you lift the carrying handle without first rotating the display, you will likely break it.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a good value
customer_reviews.text: This has a larger separate display but I don't find it useful, not bad but for me, I don't need it. It counts nicely. The only minor negative is that it starts to take the money very quickly, almost too quickly. But I like the way it works.
customer_reviews.author: JoninOC

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for cash counters
customer_reviews.text: I have a pizzeria where a lot of cash comes through. It was always a task to get the cash organized and counted. This thing has saved me precious time. If you have acash to count a counter is the way to go. I cant believe it took me this long to buy one. As for the which one, i biught this one and ive had it for a few months and couldnt be happier with it. It does get jammed with the older bills, but it has a button thatll force that bill through and it will still count it. I could imagine that happening with any counter.
customer_reviews.author: Billy G

customer_reviews.title: Not very easy to use !
customer_reviews.text: This machine gets stuck with money too often, and once ruined the money, my husband and I worked it out for a long time !💔
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fast, precise, reliable counter
customer_reviews.text: Wow. This thing can count!!! Does 200 bills for me without a hiccup. I will post a video of product working. Comes with cool accessories but I haven't used them yet though. Best price best working money counter period. Next best thing will cost you thousands.
customer_reviews.author: A. Fial

customer_reviews.title: Good Product at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: This is lower in cost than many others but considering it had good reviews, I took a chance on it. It does exactly what it is suppose to, counts the number of bills you put on. It's accurate and saves a lot of time if you are doing large deposits with a lot of small bills. I do wish it told you how much the bills actually were but I'm sure that type of option only comes in a much pricier product.
customer_reviews.author: C. Harkness

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: Yes it jammed and once I figured out how much I could load at one time it was ok. Counted twice for accuracy and got the same numbers twice. Only wish is that be you could adjust the speed.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: I would defiantly recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Bought one last month, and just ordered a second one. Yes it does jam, but not hard to clear the money, Also clear money button works well. Its not 100% accurate, however if you run money thur it twice, it almost always catches errors. I would defiantly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Neal P

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: USELESS! It works correctly less than half the time. I bought it because it was highly rated (and cheap). Couldn't contact the company for support. Tossing it into the dumpster.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Hafner

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, for the time being it never jammed, only when bills are a bit folded. Very silent and fast. No errors so far when counting. It is heavy though, but this is not a con, just a head's up. Materials feels very good quality. I am more than happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good product, but...
customer_reviews.text: I thought it added up the total $ but only counts the amount of bills
customer_reviews.author: CK

customer_reviews.title: Love the machine just sorry it doesn't count the money, only the bills.
customer_reviews.text: Great great great product. I wasn't aware it doesn't count the money but only the bills when I purchased it which sucks for me but over all the machine works good for the past year. No problems at all. It's counts wrinkly money and very fast. Good for small office uses.
customer_reviews.author: Yuval Bartal

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: We are using the counter at Church to assist in preparing the weekly deposit of contributions. It has made our job easier and more efficient as well as accurate in the currency count.
customer_reviews.author: L York

customer_reviews.title: This works great. Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: I initially bought a different money counter. It didn't work as intended so I tried this one. This works great. Very accurate, it doesn't total the bills, but that was expected. The speed is fast, sometimes too fast, but rarely do the bills fly. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Qin Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: After 2 months it doesn’t work and I couldn’t return because they don’t accept
customer_reviews.author: Maryam h.

customer_reviews.title: I see dollar signs
customer_reviews.text: When it's worth that money buy it! Works great & able to navigate through the instructions of how to operate.
customer_reviews.author: 🦓

customer_reviews.title: Durable and Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our business and it works very well. Does the same job as the more expensive ones. Light weight but durable. Counts Bill's without hamming and is easy to program.
customer_reviews.author: Dolphinhart

customer_reviews.title: For the price it's awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Seems to just fine once you figure out the hold your hand over the stack of money going thru just a little pressure on the stack and it barrels right thru the bills.
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Longan

customer_reviews.title: This machine works well and is really fun to play with
customer_reviews.text: This machine works well and is really fun to play with. I should've read the details better though. All it does is count the total number of bills you put in. It does NOT tell you how much the monetary value is.
customer_reviews.author: MrsVanderbilt

customer_reviews.title: Ruined my dining table.
customer_reviews.text: There was an oil residue on the rubber feet which ruined my nearly $1000 dinning table with stains. Also bills jam very frequently.
customer_reviews.author: brian parra

customer_reviews.title: Accurate but I still have to do math...
customer_reviews.text: Counts number of bills but does not recognize denominations. You still have to do math... but good enough
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: DOES WHAT IT IS INTENDED FOR
customer_reviews.text: Does what I need it for. Only thing that would be nice is if it knew the difference between bills
customer_reviews.author: Slick 1

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: What you see is exactly what you get. NO domination, just a counter
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I didn't  not see clearly  the specification  of the machines.
customer_reviews.text: It is fast and accurate. I was thought it can read the amount of money where i inserted. But not i have to calculate by calculator.
customer_reviews.author: Desalgne Gebremariam

customer_reviews.title: Good Value and we replaced an older unit with this one.
customer_reviews.text: So far the unit has performed better than our older model. Easy to set up bundles for denominations and wrapping for our bank deposits. Used weekly for about 1 month now with no issues. Only issue I have discovered is it seems to jam when there is taped money in the stack other than that no problems so far.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Nice Item
customer_reviews.text: Cheap plastic case, but after a few month, runs good.
customer_reviews.author: FA

customer_reviews.title: Looks great working best.
customer_reviews.text: The best quality machine, working excellent, I recommend to people buy this machine.
customer_reviews.author: Vinod

customer_reviews.title: Did not last
customer_reviews.text: We bought this Money Counter Back in March 6 2017 and on March 22 2019 the machine no longer works. We did not use it that often only once or twice a week and we always keep it clean from dust. Tried contacting the company but they do not answer =(
customer_reviews.author: GCQR

customer_reviews.title: Counting more then 20 bills: this comes in handy. Counting hundreds of bills: this is a lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I'm the treasurer for our PTA. A cash counting machine seems a little over the top, but we have an event once a year which typically generates $4K-$6K of small dollar event cash sales. Generally, it takes hours for a half-dozen people to count and its an absolute headache for me who has final sign-off responsibility. This year, it was about a 20-minute process from absolute start to finish. This thing was worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Very convienent
customer_reviews.text: This is accurate enough for me. We count a lot of twenties we get to separate them into thousands very fast very convenient works great for me.
customer_reviews.author: dolores

customer_reviews.title: Excellent machine for the money!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent machine for the money. It takes a little practice to master inserting the bills properly, but that's why it comes with instructions. I am a high volume user and am well satisfied with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa

customer_reviews.title: Great value for counting paper bills
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, plug in power and go. Recommend reading manual to learn how to make it stop counting at increments of 10’s or 1’s. Only counts number of paper bills, not currency values. If you need to add a stack of mixed value bills, this won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry D Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Time saver
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the money counter to use for an organization that has a fund raiser. It was perfect for us. Helped to get the money counted and deposited in the bank much faster.
customer_reviews.author: susie

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Used it every day for a year. Great for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Billy D.

customer_reviews.title: Ok to buy
customer_reviews.text: These are make for really smooth cash if it’s crumpled in any way, using this becomes a frustrating process
customer_reviews.author: Tianna Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid !!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing item , quick and easy to setup. And it’s got real speed!! Little heavy though but that means it’s rock solid :)
customer_reviews.author: Experiz

customer_reviews.title: i dont like this product
customer_reviews.text: don't count the bills for nomination - i buy other Machine
customer_reviews.author: Alida Vergara

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Fast! Has ripped a couple bills due to improper money placement on our part take some getting used to. As described good quality!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great long term counter.
customer_reviews.text: Replaces my 10 year old g-star. Forgot what it was like to not have jams. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Barry Anthes

customer_reviews.title: Love it super easy to use no issues
customer_reviews.text: love this machine, saves me a ton of time and very accurate
customer_reviews.author: GLEE

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work like a machine
customer_reviews.text: It gives error way too frequently. Doesn't work like a machine, sometimes it takes bills so recklessly it won't even stop until it jams. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: KSKN

customer_reviews.title: Make sure your bills are real!
customer_reviews.text: Good way to ensure your money is not fake if you have a business where cash flow is heavy. Does not count the amount you have but just the number of bills you are processing through the counter.
customer_reviews.author: Nakul M.

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied Customer
customer_reviews.text: This money counter was purchased for our church to help in the finance ministry and the staff just loves it. It cut down on the time spent counting the money and doing paper work. A great asset to the church. It meets the need for which it was purchased for.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. Don't count money very often but when I do it is a lot and this thing is a time saver for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry W.

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Product as described with fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Product as described with fast shipping. Only minor complaint would be that the screen kind of gets in the way when you have it facing towards the front. Would've been perfect if it was more towards the front of the machine rather than hovering over the feeder.
customer_reviews.author: John C

customer_reviews.title: Running like a champ
customer_reviews.text: This money counter is the best value option. The product is running strong, 7 months in. No issues so far, never have to count the stack twice.
customer_reviews.author: Oil Man

customer_reviews.title: The money Keeps getting jammed and you could barely put ...
customer_reviews.text: The money Keeps getting jammed and you could barely put a lot on each count. Sometimes the money would get stuck and you would have to open the top and pull out the single that's stuck. Very frustrating and time consuming.
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This thing counts fast and fun! It's accurate and good. Don't have any problems with it so far just counting bills. The feeder is a bit small, can only fit around 50-70 bills. Anything more and it won't fit or might get stuck.
customer_reviews.author: Dionisio L Yang

customer_reviews.title: Great little machine!
customer_reviews.text: This baby is still new, but, so far it works as stated. No problems or learning curves to operate. It's a snap. Get one!
customer_reviews.author: K. Olsen

customer_reviews.title: some times count 100% some times count wrong and good money its say fake so its 2 star
customer_reviews.text: its is not count accurate,some times count 100% some times count wrong and good money its say fake so its 2 star
customer_reviews.author: HIRAN KHAN

customer_reviews.title: Good bill counter
customer_reviews.text: Machine works great. I would have given it 5 stars but the documentation is some of the worst I've ever seen.
customer_reviews.author: John D. Sergeant

customer_reviews.title: its a great, solid product
customer_reviews.text: Been in use for a few weeks now, its a great, solid product. I just wish there was a start button instead of starting the second you place a stack of bills in the feeder.
customer_reviews.author: Mason

customer_reviews.title: Bad fuse out of the box.  Worked fine after replacing fuse.
customer_reviews.text: Our product arrived and looked to have been re packaged. So, we were skeptical on if it was a used model. Plugged in right out of the box, the item did not work. It did not power on at all. We had to replace the fuse and it ended up working fine. This should help save us lots of time in our business.
customer_reviews.author: Gina Theesfield

customer_reviews.title: Works as described
customer_reviews.text: Works as described. As another reviewer mentioned, I wish it had a start button rather than starting automatically but it's not a significant issue.
customer_reviews.author: Terry M.

customer_reviews.title: MONEY COUNTER
customer_reviews.text: I serves the purpose, and we figured out how to add the monies by putting the same bills in at once, after reading some of the reviews. So it works well for us.
customer_reviews.author: Fireplace mom

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely buy this again.
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Saves a ton of time and safer then the old fashion way of licking my fingers after every 20 bills. When this stops working I’m right away ordering the same one.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Kreider

customer_reviews.title: Never been wrong.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfect every time and have had it for almost two years now. Just be aware that it does not know the denominations of currency like some money counters, it only counts how many bills there are. This means you have to count tens, twenties, fifties, etc all separately.
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: For the price I think it's great. You have to get use to how you ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my small business needs. For the price I think it's great. You have to get use to how you put the bills in to make it run through just right. Has made my life a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Abhishek Singh

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick bundling
customer_reviews.text: After counting stacks using this, the bank informed me that some of my stacks were slightly inaccurate. Good for quick bundling, but I'm scared to count large amounts of money with this accurately, especially if its older money.
customer_reviews.author: AdioKing

customer_reviews.title: Money counter is a must for every business!
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing! My only regret is that I wish I had bought this a long time ago! Would have saved me hours of counting and recounting! It's been perfectly accurate so far!
customer_reviews.author: kawi77

customer_reviews.title: Should have bought this years ago!!!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!!!! Definitely worth it if you run a business! Saved our booster club two hours the first time we used it! Counter is super fast and accurate!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Solid machine
customer_reviews.text: This is a fast money counter. For the money paid it is very good. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome machine for the price!!! Heavy not cheap, easy to use, almost never jams, large bill hopper. Has made my life so much easier for counting large deposits.... So far perfect every time.
customer_reviews.author: reeseak

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars!
customer_reviews.text: Have been using one of this for years and plan to purchase another! I am from Trinidad in the Caribbean and to date i have not cleaned or serviced this machine! It is one of the best products i purchased and its still going after all these years i cannot believe it still but buying another!
customer_reviews.author: Inx

customer_reviews.title: Fast
customer_reviews.text: Takes a little practice to get good at using it , but it s fast and accurate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend
customer_reviews.text: It does about everything I wanted it to do and is quite fast.
customer_reviews.author: Rick101

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good value. I love it when I can go on Amazon and find almost anything i need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A real time saver!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for the school and have used it for a month. Works great with no problems. Can't believe how much bill counters have decreased in price over the past years.
customer_reviews.author: V. Laney

customer_reviews.title: Works great so far
customer_reviews.text: No complaints with this one. Plug it in an go!
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Great for Schools
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for the High School I am Controller at, works great cut time for counting money by 75%. They counted by hand before and after each sporting event for gate, concessions and apparel shop 3 hours, 45 minutes now, probably even less. Works well only item to keep it from getting five stars is some bills that have a crease will not go through first time, but this is low in occurrence.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Drish

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I’ve use the counters for about four years and absolutely love them. Durable and accurate
customer_reviews.author: iperambulate

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: This thing is perfect. It was exactly what I wa looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Otree Doubie

customer_reviews.title: awesome for what I need it
customer_reviews.text: awesome for what I need it. It only counts bills and checks if they are real. You must separate your bills first.
customer_reviews.author: Rosado

customer_reviews.title: Only count how many bills...but it works great!
customer_reviews.text: Work great. We use it for the school PTA...it count how many bills...save a lot of time!
customer_reviews.author: giselle

customer_reviews.title: Good product at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, delivered as stated, saves time counting. Don't put too many bills in at once. Only used to count, not check veracity of bills, although it performs that as well. Good product at a good price.
customer_reviews.author: David Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Finds counterfeits!
customer_reviews.text: I've had other money counters in the past, this one supersedes the others by a mile. It found a fake bill and i could hardly tell with my naked eye. well worth the cost!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Saved us hours of time! Maybe days!
customer_reviews.text: We use it everyday at our business, it has honestly saved hours of counting that used to be done manually.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B.

customer_reviews.title: Compact
customer_reviews.text: Works ok gets Jams a lot but easy to remove jam
customer_reviews.author: Charles jones

customer_reviews.title: Great price, works great
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. Don’t know how they make such a good product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Jim

customer_reviews.title: Was quick and easy to set up and use
customer_reviews.text: Was quick and easy to set up and use! Pulls money a little fast, however, you get use to it! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Beverly Wenger

customer_reviews.title: Problems after 10 months of moderate use.
customer_reviews.text: Front sensor that resets the count to 0 once the bills are removed has stopped working after 10 months of moderate use. Waiting for gstar to reply regarding warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: GStar Money Counter with UV/MG Counterfeit Bill Detection Plus External Display and 1 Year Warranty
feature_bullets: [Energy Saving]: Power Consumption Operating Modes Of Less Than 90W When Working And Less Than 3W When Idle

[Powerful & Quiet]: Capable Of Working Continuous For Hours While Counting 1000 Bills Per Minute. Ultraviolet (UV), Magnetic (MG), Infrared (selected models), Metal Thread (selected models), and Dimensional (selected models) Sensors Helps to Detect Counterfeit Bills. This Money counter Operates With Noise Levels Less Than 60 dB.
[Efficient]: Accurate And Precise Sorting With A Miss Counterfeit Detection Rate of 1/100000.
[Proven Success & Support]: American Brand, American Seller Backed by 1-Year Manufacturer Warranty, Top selling Money Counting Machine On Amazon For Years with MOST Positive Reviews.
[User friendly]: Counts how many bills in the stack fast and accurately. Easy-to-read LED Display And Automatic Self Testing Ability.
